member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.DeploymentItemAttribute
member.summary: Used to specify deployment item (file or directory) for per-test deployment. Can be specified on test class or test method. Can have multiple instances of the attribute to specify more than one item. The item path can be absolute or relative, if relative, it is relative to RunConfig.RelativePathRoot.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.DeploymentItemAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The file or directory to deploy. The path is relative to the build output directory. The item will be copied to the same directory as the deployed test assemblies.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.DeploymentItemAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class
member.param: The relative or absolute path to the file or directory to deploy. The path is relative to the build output directory. The item will be copied to the same directory as the deployed test assemblies.

The path of the directory to which the items are to be copied. It can be either absolute or relative to the deployment directory. All files and directories identified by will be copied to this directory.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.DeploymentItemAttribute.Path
member.summary: Gets the path of the source file or folder to be copied.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.DeploymentItemAttribute.OutputDirectory
member.summary: Gets the path of the directory to which the item is copied.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext
member.summary: 用于存储提供给单元测试的信息。

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.DataRow
member.summary: Gets the current data row when test is used for data driven testing.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.DataConnection
member.summary: Gets current data connection row when test is used for data driven testing.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.TestRunDirectory
member.summary: Gets base directory for the test run, under which deployed files and result files are stored.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.DeploymentDirectory
member.summary: Gets directory for files deployed for the test run. Typically a subdirectory of 。

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.ResultsDirectory
member.summary: Gets base directory for results from the test run. Typically a subdirectory of 。

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.TestRunResultsDirectory
member.summary: Gets directory for test run result files. Typically a subdirectory of 。

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.TestResultsDirectory
member.summary: Gets directory for test result files.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.TestDir
member.summary: Gets base directory for the test run, under which deployed files and result files are stored. Same as 。改为使用该属性。

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.TestDeploymentDir
member.summary: Gets directory for files deployed for the test run. Typically a subdirectory of . Same as 。改为使用该属性。

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.TestLogsDir
member.summary: Gets directory for test run result files. Typically a subdirectory of . Same as 。对测试运行结果文件使用该属性，或 改为针对特定于测试的结果文件。

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.FullyQualifiedTestClassName
member.summary: Gets the Fully-qualified name of the class containing the test method currently being executed

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext.TestName
